verses.name: Exodus 6:20
verses.text: And Amram took him Jochebed his father’s sister to wife; and she bare him Aaron and Moses: and the years of the life of Amram were an hundred and thirty and seven years.

verses.name: Exodus 6:21
verses.text: And the sons of Izhar; Korah, and Nepheg, and Zichri.

verses.name: Exodus 6:22
verses.text: And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.

verses.name: Exodus 6:23
verses.text: And Aaron took him Elisheba, daughter of Amminadab, sister of Naashon, to wife; and she bare him Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

verses.name: Exodus 6:24
verses.text: And the sons of Korah; Assir, and Elkanah, and Abiasaph: these are the families of the Korhites.
